text: (nampikkaiyalarkale! Poriliruntu verriyutan) avarkalitam ninkal tirumpa vantal, ninkal avarkalai(k kurram pitikkatu) purakkanittu (vittu)vita, avarkal allahvin mitu unkal mun cattiyam ceyvarkal. Akave, ninkalum avarkalai purakkanittu (vittu)vitunkal. Niccayamaka avarkal acuttamanavarkal. Avarkal cellumitam narakamtan. (Atuve) avarkal ceytu kontirunta (tiya) ceyalukkuriya tantanaiyakum
